title: Stacey Dooley celebrates Kevin Clifton's birthday by posting cute pic
text:
Stacey Dooley cosies up to Kevin Clifton during his 37th birthday party (Picture: Instagram / @sjdooley)

Stacey Dooley celebrated her boyfriend and former Strictly Come Dancing partner Kevin Clifton’s birthday a day early on Saturday evening so she can jet off to Korea.

The 32-year-old TV presenter took to Instagram from the comfort of her cosy bed on Saturday morning to level with her followers about the plan for the day.

‘Oh lord, I have a lot to do,’ she revealed in an Instagram story. ‘I am going to Korea tomorrow, [and] haven’t packed a thing, haven’t even got a case which is really brilliant.’

She added: ‘But this evening we are going to pick up a cake and go dancing. The dream that is Candice Brown has made us this cake and I can’t wait to taste it.’

Stacey then posted a series of videos from the birthday boy’s party featuring guests setting the dance floor alight with their dance moves.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

And then came a photo of the star with friends Jo and Harriet, as well as a cute snap of her and Kev embracing each other.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Happy bday king Kev,’ she wrote on the Instagram story.

Just before she jetted out of London to Korea, she posted an adorable photo of the couple in front of balloons that spelled out ‘King Kev’.

She’s wearing a silver top and big hoop earrings.

Stacey Dooley cosies up to Kevin Clifton during his 37th birthday party (Picture: Instagram / @sjdooley)

She captioned the Instagram post, simply: ’37,’ with a cute little red heart emoji too.

Fans flooded Stacey’s social media with messages of support for the couple.

One wrote: ‘Happy birthday King Kev!’

While another commented: ‘You two are just so cute. Happy Birthday Kevin, have a great day.’

Kevin and dance partner Anneka Rice were booted off 2019’s season of Strictly Come Dancing in the second week.

After the announcement of their elimination, Stacey told fans on social media: ‘Kev and Anneka got knocked out this weekend and I just want to say I am so proud of both of them, but particularly Kevin because I just think he is the most incredible teacher.’

Stacey had been partnered with pro dancer Kevin on Strictly in 2018 and they went on to win the show, taking home the coveted Glitterball trophy.

Following the breakdown of her relationship with ex Sam Tucknott, it was revealed Stacey and Kevin began dating.

description: Stacey Dooley wished her former Strictly Come Dancing partner and current boyfriend Kevin Clifton a happy birthday on Instagram.
